effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Will not reduce the target’s HP below 1.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Will not reduce the target’s HP below 1.

short_effect.x_y: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.

flavor_text.x_y: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
